author: wbinnssmith
message:
Rust: Update safe crates to 2024 Edition (#79104)

These crates could be updated to the 2024 edition of Rust with ~no code
changes~ only formatting changes through `cargo fmt`.

Future PRs will address crates individually with code changes.

files.patch:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ name = "next-api"
 version = "0.1.0"
 description = "TBD"
 license = "MIT"
-edition = "2021"
+edition = "2024"
 autobenches = false
 
 [lib]
